name: Summit in Space
description:
"Summit in Space" is a short precision platformer in a pixel retro style. The Brave Adventurer in a blue costume decided to reach the most dangerous Summit... The Space Summit! There are some dangerous landscapes and spikes on his way!

Game Features
  • Old school gameplay
  • Comfortable controls
  • Nice pixel visuals
  • Steam achievements support
  • Some levels are really hard!
